CustomField.description: Async dispatch strategy for Conversational and Email agents: Low (Queueable for guaranteed sequential processing), High (Platform Events for high throughput, fire-and-forget). Ignored for Batch agents which always use Queueables. Note: Platform Events don't guarantee processing order.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For Conversational and Email agents: choose Low for guaranteed sequential processing, High for high-throughput concurrent execution (fire-and-forget). Batch agents ignore this setting.
CustomField.label: Async Dispatch Type
